<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 14"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Aura of Righteousness](/Feats.aspx?ID=5921) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Champion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=811" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 98 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Prerequisites**
champion's aura, holy

</column>

---

Your righteous aura dampens evil's might and prevents the unholy from escaping you. You and all allies in your champion's aura gain resistance 5 to [unholy](/Traits.aspx?ID=521) spells, unholy Strikes, and other unholy effects. If a [teleportation](/Traits.aspx?ID=710) spell or effect would teleport an unholy creature out of your champion's aura, your aura attempts to [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) it, using the spell rank and DC of your devotion spells.
name: Aura of Righteousness
